title: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
author: eric-carle
summary: A beloved picture book about a caterpillar that eats its way through various foods before transforming into a butterfly. Known for its distinctive collage illustrations and die-cut pages showing the caterpillar's progress.

attribution.note: Book data from Open Library (openlibrary.org), part of Internet Archive.

description: One sunny day, a caterpillar pops out of an egg. He is very hungry and begins searching for food.  He eats his way through ten very sweet pages and gets a tummy ache before finally finding a good, healthy leaf, which makes him sleepy. Then something really amazing happens. But you will have to read it your self to find out what!
